attributes.action: introduce legislation to change the law to make it illegal, punishable by an automatic minimum FIVE year jail sentence, for civil servants to be used by politicians as party political activitists.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Damian McBride was a civil servant who was employed by Mr Brown as a personal adviser on party political matters.  This is NOT what civil servants are employed to do and Mr Brown should be personally paying for any civil servant who becomes an adviser to him.  Taxpayers should not be picking up the tab for people who are party political activists.
